title: Lol.Client has stopped working
body: My League keeps crashing everytime I login and I dont know what to do. I have reinstalled it many times but it stills keeps crashing. Someone please help!

replies.body:
When you get the *LoL Client has stopped working* message, it's usually because the client has dropped its connection to the game service, which caused the crash. This is most often the result of incompatible network settings that cause a poor connection, so I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
